Text: Enron Direct You may have received a complaint letter from Mr Forrest one of our customers Cc Ken and Dave You may have received a complaint letter with regards a gas supply contract with Enron Direct from one of our customers in the UK The customer Mr and Mrs Forrest wrote to me through Mr Kenneth Clarke who is a Member of the Parliament in the UK Enron Direct has dealt with the complaint as soon as it was received and we sorted out the issue with the customer directly In addition we wrote a letter to Mr Kenneth Clarke explaining the actions taken by Enron The matter is resolved and all the different parties have been informed If you have any questions please come back to me and I will give all the details you need Regards Enrique Gimenez Enron Direct UK
